Reviews.Title: Good picture, terrible sound quality!
Reviews.Author: Joel G. Hancock "JGHancock"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for the kitchen so we could have something to watch while cooking and cleaning up. It was the least expensive one I could find for the size that was just right for a small space between two cabinets. It is light weight and has very good picture quality, but the sound quality makes it almost unusable. It sounded similar to a mobile phone or tablet that is connected to an un-powered little block or pair of speakers --- almost exactly like an old hand-held transistor radio.After just two days I moved it to a guest bedroom and attached some powered speakers I had used with a notebook computer. To my surprise the sound quality was very good so it must be the speakers themselves that are so flimsy that they cannot handle the sound coming from the internal amp.This is definitely a "don't buy" unless you use it somewhere to be seen and not heard (like a waiting area.)

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: Nupe51
Reviews.Content: So far, so good.  It has a great picture, once you set up the TV properly.  However, as stated before, the sound is horrible which is not a big problem since I have speakers that I can hook up to the TV.  Also, installing the HDMI cord can be a problem when trying to hook the cord to the bottom HDMI connection.  The problem is due to the way that the way all of the connections are off set and it is hard to a line the HDMI up with the plug.  Also, since I have DirecTV, I cannot synchronize the remote with the TV since it does not recognize the brand name.  Other than that, it appears to be a good TV for the prices and I am satisfied..

Reviews.Title: Good enough
Reviews.Author: Jade
Reviews.Content: You know, I often wonder about some persons and their reviews-I think some expectations are grossly unrealistic. For anyone on the market for a reasonably priced LED TV I have to say this is a great deal compared to similar items out there. Fine the sound isn't theatre bass quality but for everyday watching its fine- there are settings that you can choose and play around with to adjust to your liking. As one person noted, slap on some cheap external speakers for things like movie watching and you will be even happier. I've enjoyed playing around with all the other features too. So far I am very satisfied with what this TV has to offer.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: cliftonmthomas
Reviews.Content: The TV came packaged as well as any other I've purchased, and thoughtfully included a Philips-head screw driver to attach the base. Following the included guide, setup was a breeze with my TV tuner. The unit uses Sony codes (which is indicated in the manual) if you need to program your universal remote to operate it. The screen has great brightness and good viewing angles as you'd expect from an LED-lit panel. The only disappointment is that the built in speakers are not very loud. I didn't expect them to be great however, considering the price. Overall I'm very satisfied with the purchase so far. I'm hopeful that its apparent quality is reflected in its longevity as well.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV for unknown brand
Reviews.Author: Harvey Fagler
Reviews.Content: Great picture and was easy to set up. I wish I had gotten two of these around Christmas. I waited a month to do the review to assure no issues. Easy 4 out of 5.

Reviews.Title: Sony for half the cost.
Reviews.Author: Doug M.
Reviews.Content: It is the same TV as a Sony for a fraction of the cost. When it comes time for another TV it wil most likely be an oCOSMO.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a great value
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: I waited to write my review due to seeing how well it worked. This TV has been perfect for my son. No issues whatsoever and the picture is clear.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Renny Wilson "sensible shopper"
Reviews.Content: Bought for an extra room.  Looks nice, plays great, no problems.  Excellent price.  Only problem is finding remote codes to work with our satellite tv system, but since this tv isn't used often, not a big deal.

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: James Hullihen
Reviews.Content: Decent tv. The sound could be a little better but still a good tv. Item was as described.  Good tv for my son. This product shipped on time and shipped fast.

Reviews.Title: works as advertised
Reviews.Author: pyroguy "blazingflames"
Reviews.Content: I've been wanting to upgrade to a flat-screen TV for the longest time, but was unable to afford one at the time.  So I managed to come across this particular model, and it works as advertised.  And with a couple of HDMI cables and a Blu-Ray player (both of which I also own as well), makes it a decent entertainment system.

Reviews.Title: good cheap TV
Reviews.Author: S. Safford
Reviews.Content: Picture is good and clear.  Sound (audio) is a little tinny but for the price - its a great deal!!!

Reviews.Title: oCosmo 24-inch TV does not have a terrific picture.
Reviews.Author: George Harmon
Reviews.Content: The picture seems a bit fuzzy.  I have tried to tune it in but it is not nearly as sharp and with real world color as the similar sized LG model.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: Bill Brower "George Brower"
Reviews.Content: Picture is very good, but the sound is horrible. When considering what to buy, remember you'll have to spend a little more on some speakers.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: shontia wilson
Reviews.Content: The sound is low even when u turn the volume all the way up.other than that I like it.Prolly the brand of it has a lot to do with it.

Reviews.Title: Buy this NOW! Better than Black Friday
Reviews.Author: Amazonian Lavor
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a new HDTV for a great price, this is definitely for you. I bought this as an upgrade to my previous 19 inch purchased from Walmart. The size is perfect for a bedroom.SOUND: I have no idea what the sound complaints were about. This TV is very loud. I'm not sure if they were using it outside or something. But mine sounds really good.I am very satisfied! Got this for a steal at $116. Bought this weekend and arrived today (Tuesday, with Prime ).I went to Best Buy and saw that they had a TV the same size for 129.99+tax. However it was only 720p HD and this one is 1080p HD.I also watched the price drop on this item, when I first saw it, it was around $150.Definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Bad tvs
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: I had high hopes for this brand given the great prices being offered, but they suck. I first bought the 32" and the lower left part of the screen would not go black, only grey.I bought a 24" and it had numerous dead pixels dead center of the screen.Returned both.

ProductInfo.Features:
Sleek and Slim Black 24-Inch LED 1080P HDTV
2 x HDMI Port, USB Port
ATSC/NTSC/Clear QAM
60 Hz Refresh Rate
Wall mountable 100 x 100 VESA Standard
ProductInfo.Name: oCOSMO 24-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV (Glossy Black)
